events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request regarding return and money back has been classified under the Refund category.
Support agent Sarah was assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label to return the item.
The refund has been processed and you should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and the return process was convenient for you.
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to hear your feedback about this support experience.
